review_data.title: Delicious food. Friendly faces!
review_data.content: Wonderful! I was here for lunch and had a selection of meat and vegetable curries, naan bread, chapati and rice. Everything fresh and delicious. Great value and lovely staff! Will definitely be back!

review_data.title: Geheimtipp
review_data.content: Super feines Essen mit freundlicher Bedienung und gutem Preis- & Leistungsverhältnis. Wir kommen gerne wieder.

review_data.title: Decent meal - dont take too many add ons if you're conscious spender
review_data.content: We had their vegetarian lunch. It had lobia, dal, naan and samosa. The taste and service both were good. The only problem is, they served me a fixed menu on buffet option. To another customer , I saw panner being served. When I asked, they...More

review_data.title: Take away Biryani
review_data.content: Ordered takeaway Biryani and Butter chicken for my friends and I. The food was delicious. Awesome, according to a friend. Very authentic. Generous portions. So far, the best Indian I have tried in Zürich.

review_data.title: Bester Inder in Zürich
review_data.content: Von aussen etwas unscheinbar ist ohh curry (noch) ein absoluter Geheimtipp. Mit Abstand die beste indische Küche weit und breit!

review_data.title: Superb.
review_data.content: Great taste just like Indian taste should. Very nice ambience. We took Gobi Manchurian and chicken biryani. Just awesome in taste. We love it. We will go very soon to try other dishes too.

review_data.title: At last, an original Indian restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: This is a real treat. Not a huge menu, but with something for everyone, from a sweet potato starter via different lassis to vegetarian and chicken curries... and the highlight for me was the lamb shank signature dish. Everything has a little twist, it is...More

review_data.title: Authentic Indian food!
review_data.content: Authentic Indian food. This is the best place I‘ve tried in Zurich so far and I’ve been to a lot of Indian restaurants even with locals. Everything was nicely served but also really good. Highly recommend :)

review_data.title: Amazing Food!
review_data.content: Since it opened just a few weeks ago we’ve already gone there twice, once for dinner and once for the lunch buffet. Both times we had a wonderful time. The restaurant is easy to get to and has a welcoming atmosphere. At dinner we went...More

review_data.title: Feels like in India!!!
review_data.content: I have been trying Indian food in Zurich since last 2 years, and one thing that I had always felt is that the taste is not exactly what we eat in India. Fortunately Ooh Curry is here!!!! It’s been a month it has opened and...More

review_data.title: cool ambience, great food... must visit for Indian street food lovers.

review_data.title: Delicious food
review_data.content: The food was really good, service was great and the restaurant itself was cosy and stylish. Really close to Oerlikon train station so very easy to get to.

review_data.title: Gut und freundlich

review_data.title: Amazing Indian Street Food
review_data.content: Amazing Indian street food. Tried Brunch today. Will certainly visit again to try the A la Carte Dinner too. Chole Bhature a fav for kids.

review_data.title: Mrs.
review_data.content: I highly recommend Ooh! Curry Excellent food. A different but special menu. The taste of home comes to Zurich! Warm and friendly service. And super fast too! And piping hot! A win win combination! Keep it up Ooh! Curry We will be back for more!...More

review_data.title: Perfect Indian food with a cozy, homely feel
review_data.content: I love Indian food and for that matter equally apprehensive in visiting an Indian restaurant in zurich for the lack of authenticity, taste and the atmosphere. Looks like at Ooh Curry all these missing criterias are fulfilled. The place gives you a cozy, homely feel...More

review_data.title: If you are wanting to taste authentic Indian food similar to what is cooked in home kitchen then this is the place to be
review_data.content: I normally avoid Indian restaurants when dining out in Switzerland as I don't find the taste to be authentic and I want to try other cuisines as I get great Indian food at home. However, after visiting Ooh! Curry my taste buds are yearning for...More
